title: A suite of crypto legislation passed the House Financial Services Committee this week
description:
On July 27, the House Financial Services Committee advanced seven pieces of legislation concerning critical issues in digital asset regulation. They will now proceed to a full vote in the House. A Republican-led effort, the bill’s progression is a significant legislative moment for cryptocurrency regulations. Opposition remains, however, from Democrats on the committee; Representative Maxine […]

The post A suite of crypto legislation passed the House Financial Services Committee this week appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: $XRP: Japanese Financial Giant Plans to Use Ripple’s XRP-Powered ODL Product for Remittances
description: In a recent webinar, SBI VC Trade, the cryptocurrency exchange arm of Japan’s financial giant SBI Group, reportedly unveiled its plans for Ripple’s On-Demand Liquidity (ODL) product in Japan. The company intends to use XRP for cross-border payments. According to an article by Albert Brown for The Crypto Basic published earlier today, the webinar, held […]

title: Worldcoin data collection investigated by French privacy regulator
description: Worldcoin, which is gaining notoriety due to its controversial iris-scanning biometrics, is currently being investigated by French data authority

title: As Dogecoin and Shiba Inu Flutter,  DigiToads Shows Unstoppable Signs Of Being A 100x Meme Coin
description: In cryptocurrency, meme coins have gained immense popularity, often driven by hype and celebrity endorsement. Recently, two prominent meme coins, Dogecoin (DOGE) and Shiba Inu (SHIB), which once captured the imagination of investors, have experienced faltering in their value and popularity. Amidst this faltering, DigiToads (TOADS), an innovative project, has emerged, positioning itself as the [...]
